title: About Respiratory Illnesses
content:
Similiarities
: Neither antiviral medications or antibiotics are sold over the counter in the United States. You can only get them if you have a prescription from a health care provider.
Widely available and effective treatments for respiratory viruses
Antiviral medications for COVID-19 and flu work best when taken as soon as possible and are recommended for those at higher risk.
COVID-19 antiviral medications
